content.question: Write the getAbbreviation method, which returns an abbreviation consisting of the first letter of each word in message. Assume that message consists of two or more words, each separated by a single space.For example, if the value of message is "as soon as possible", then getAbbreviation() should return "asap". Complete the getAbbreviation method. /** * Returns an abbreviation for the instance variable message, * as described in part (b) * Preconditions: Each word in message is separated by a single space. * message contains two or more words. * Postcondition: message is unchanged. */ public String getAbbreviation()

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
